title: Diamond ADC/Support LFT

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
IGN: Fwuzzy
I am pretty flexible, looking for a serious team that plays at least a few times a week.
I play all ad carries well and a few really well (Look at stats for better info)
I'm a chill guy, I don't rage or flame. I just want to improve and be a better player.

Msg here or in game to talk more.

replies.body:
Hi there Fwuzzy! I work for Quintessential eSports and we're looking for anyone who is diamond or above and in oce to apply for our pro team! If you think this is something for you and are looking to take your league up to the next level applications are still open at [www.qtesports.com](http://www.qtesports.com) ! We very much hope you apply! <3
- Thanks QTE team

Hey man, would you be keen to start a team with me and a mate of mine?
We hope to try and reach the team to diamond
IGN: Mr Spook (Plat V) 
My mate it diamond V

If you're interested let me know and add me on league
